DOC.brief_summary: Normal pressure hydrocephalus diagnosis based on quantitative study of cerebro-spinal fluid and blood flow by phase contrast magnetic resonance imaging.
DOC.brief_title: Flow MRI in Normal Pressure Hydrocephalus
DOC.criteria: Ventricular dilation seen on morphological magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) Walking disorder Cognitive disorder Participants gave their written informed consent Contraindication to MRI Obstructive tumoral hydrocephalus Curatorship or tutorship Pregnancy or lactation No social assurance
